questions.question: Which of the following is the correct full form of SAW?
Which statement regarding submerged arc welding is correct?

answers.c: It is a form of gas welding

questions.question: Which of the following industries commonly uses submerged arc welding?
What is the purpose of granular flux in submerged arc welding

answers.b: To protect the weld from contamination
answers.c: To provide a source of filler metal

questions.question: In submerged arc welding, the welding arc is

answers.c: Completely submerged under the flux layer
